Release Notes¶

This document tracks releases, changes, and archival guidance for the Dynamic Causal Hypergraph (DCH) project.

P2 Research Package (2025-10-12)¶

Summary

  • Bayesian plasticity + uncertainty utilities

    • Beta–Bernoulli engine with posterior-mean updates — BetaPlasticityEngine.update_from_evidence()

    • Monte Carlo CIs with fixed seed — credible_interval_mc()

  • EAT logger with SHA-256 hash chaining — EATAuditLogger; verify via verify_file()

  • CRC extraction logger — CRCLogger

  • Synthetic + dataset micro CLIs (offline-safe)

    • Synthetic quick-run — run_main()

    • Dataset micro — run_main()

  • Stats harness (CIs, effect sizes)

    • Reliability series — reliability_ci_time_series()

    • Effect sizes — effect_size_time_series()

  • Ablations suite — run_main() (Beta vs EMA; abstraction flags)

  • Baselines CLI (dry-run compatible) — run_main()

  • Manifold NoOp — NoOpManifold

  • Dual-proof gating (soft/hard, default OFF); parity and rejection semantics covered by tests:

    • test_dual_proof_default_off_parity, test_dual_proof_noop_soft_parity, test_dual_proof_grow_hard_rejects, test_dual_proof_backward_soft_counts

  • DPO prototype with analysis:

    • Engine — DPOEngine.apply()

    • Confluence/termination utilities — analyze_critical_pairs, check_termination

  • Deterministic tests and offline safety across runners and loggers

v1.0.0 (2025-10-11)¶

Summary of delivered features:

  • Core DCH

    • Dynamic hypergraph construction (TC‑kNN) — dch_core/dhg.py

    • Constrained backward traversal for credit assignment — dch_core/traversal.py

    • Plasticity and pruning — dch_core/plasticity.py

    • Streaming FSM — dch_core/fsm.py

    • Hierarchical abstraction (scaffold/hook) — dch_core/abstraction.py

    • Task-aware scaffolding (policy hook) — dch_core/scaffolding.py

    • WL-style embedding — dch_core/embeddings/wl.py

  • Pipeline and evaluation

    • Orchestrator and configs — dch_pipeline/pipeline.py, configs/

    • Metrics/evaluation utils — dch_pipeline/metrics.py, dch_pipeline/evaluation.py

    • Stats utilities for significance testing — dch_pipeline/stats.py

    • Logging utilities and artifacts — dch_pipeline/logging_utils.py

  • Data layer

    • Encoders and transforms — dch_data/encoders.py, dch_data/transforms.py

    • Dataset scaffolds — dch_data/nmnist.py, dch_data/dvs_gesture.py

  • CLI and tests

    • CLI runner (torch-optional) — dch-run → scripts/run_experiment.py

    • Unit/integration tests (CPU) — tests/

  • Optional SNN integration

    • Norse models interface — dch_snn/norse_models.py, dch_snn/interface.py

    • Torch-optional default; enable via snn.enabled=true

  • Benchmarks

    • Traversal/pipeline JSON benchmarks — benchmarks/benchmark_traversal.py, benchmarks/benchmark_pipeline.py

  • Documentation

    • Minimal Sphinx docsite (optional) — docs/conf.py, docs/index.rst

    • Usage and troubleshooting guides — docs/USAGE.md, docs/TROUBLESHOOTING.md

    • Module responsibility matrix — docs/ModuleResponsibilityMatrix.md

    • Hardware mapping appendix — docs/HardwareAppendix.md

    • Results templates — docs/RESULTS.md

    • Supplementary materials scaffold — docs/SUPPLEMENTARY.md

Torch-optional policy:

  • Core pipeline, tests, and CLI run without torch, norse, or tonic.

  • SNN features activate only when explicitly requested (snn.enabled=true).

Tagging and archival guidance¶

Tag the release:

git tag -a v1.0.0 -m "DCH v1.0.0: core pipeline, torch-optional CLI, benchmarks, docs"
git push origin v1.0.0

Export artifacts to docs/export/:

  • Recommended exports (after experiments complete):

    • Assembled PDFs/HTML: specs and whitepaper

    • Evaluation protocol: docs/EVALUATION_PROTOCOL.md

    • Reproducibility guide: docs/REPRODUCIBILITY.md

    • Results tables: docs/RESULTS.md (freeze the filled version)

    • Module responsibility matrix: docs/ModuleResponsibilityMatrix.md

    • Hardware appendix: docs/HardwareAppendix.md

    • Supplementary figures: place final figures under docs/figures/

  • Helper scripts (optional):

    • HTML export: scripts/export_html.py

    • PDF export: scripts/export_pdf.sh

Docsite build (optional):

python -m pip install -U sphinx myst-parser furo
make -C docs html
# or:
python -m sphinx -b html docs docs/_build/html

Changelog¶

Unreleased

  • Add optional adapters and datasets

  • Expand unit test coverage for traversal and FSM

  • Improve docsite with API references via autodoc

v1.0.0 — 2025-10-11

  • Initial stable release with torch-optional pipeline, CLI runner, benchmarks, and minimal docsite.

Release 0.9.0 Checklist¶

  • Update version in pyproject.toml and dch_core/init.py

  • Run gate review CLI and ensure passed:true:

    • dch-gate –output-dir artifacts/gate –report-name gate_report.json

  • Build sdist/wheel (ensure build-system present):

    • python -m build

  • Install in a clean venv and run quick synthetic:

    • python -m pip install dist/dch-0.9.0-py3-none-any.whl

    • dch-quick –mode synthetic –artifacts-dir artifacts/quick

  • Optionally publish to TestPyPI:

    • python -m pip install -U twine

    • twine upload -r testpypi dist/*

    • python -m pip install –index-url https://test.pypi.org/simple/ –extra-index-url https://pypi.org/simple dch==0.9.0
